title: T206 Southern Leaguer from the Mobile Bears..
author: Joshwesley

posts.post_title: T206 Southern Leaguer from the Mobile Bears..
posts.post_content:
Looking for a mobile bear SL'er..

Collecting history from my home city.

Can be raw, graded, or beat up substantially... 
Just need the words MOBILE to be on it.

Not looking to spend hundreds on a psa 5 or anything like that.

PM if you might have an old mobile bear laying around!

Thanks,
Josh
I'm pretty sure that you may be looking at the wrong set. I might be mistaken but pretty sure that the Mobile players were from the Mobile Seagulls.

You might be 100% correct...

Still looking for SL mobile players

Hickman and/or Thornton
